events.comment: By default, hide the moving camera triggers
Make all Desk-like layers have a 'parallax' effect
If the mouse is over the Look_Left object, then move the camera left
If the mouse is over the Look_Right object, then move the camera right
In order to prevent the camera from moving outside the boundary, we will use the "Enforce camera boundaries" function
If the W key is pressed and the vent is closed, play the opening animation and set open to true
If the vent animation is opening and the animation just got done, keep it open
If the vent is open and the w key is pressed change the animation and set it to false
If the vent animation is Closing and the animation just got done, keep it Closed
Add Usage + Transparent
If the A key is pressed and the Door is closed, play the opening animation and set open to true
If the Door animation is opening and the animation just got done, keep it open
If the Door is open and the A key is pressed change the animation and set it to false
If the Door animation is Closing and the animation just got done, keep it Closed
Add Usage
If the D key is pressed and the Door is closed, play the opening animation and set open to true
If the Door animation is opening and the animation just got done, keep it open
If the Door is open and the D key is pressed change the animation and set it to false
If the Door animation is Closing and the animation just got done, keep it Closed
Add Usage
If the F key is pressed and the vent is closed, play the opening animation and set open to true
If the vent animation is opening and the animation just got done, keep it open
If the vent is open and the F key is pressed change the animation and set it to false
If the vent animation is Closing and the animation just got done, keep it Closed
Add Usage
If the space key is released, and the fan is on, on you can control it, then turn the fan off
If the space key is released, and the fan is off, on you can control it, then turn the fan on
If the fan is on, play the animation
If the fan is on, play the sound on channel 1
If the fan is off, pause the fan animation
If the fan is off, pause the sound on channel 1

Notes for Power in Ultra Custom Night

0 meter = 7 seconds

1 meter = 3 seconds

2 meter = 2 seconds

3 meter = 1 seconds

4 meter = 0.5 seconds

5 meter = 0.2?
Always, if the number is in the triple digits, then set the string to the power
Always, if the number is low than 100 but higher than 9, then add a space before displaying power
Always, if the number is lower than 9, then add 2 spaces before displaying power
Remove power at different speeds depending on the usage bar and power generator is off
Always set the Usage Value to the Usage percent (This is to prevent a glitch that can allow users to remove usage despite additional usage being used
Never let the Usage Value go under 0
POWER OUTAGE
Always set the Noise Value to the Noise percent (This is to prevent a glitch that can allow users to remove noise despite additional noise being used
Never let the Usage Value go under 0

This Event group will handle the "Detection" for it the object is in use. This will mostly be used for animatronics. The reason why I couldn't use the previous values are due to how they are program (for example, a value only gets set when the door is already closed, not while it's closing)
Theory for later: If I make it so if you press for it to close, but release it to open, could that work? Maybe..Maybe not
